availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nicholas County farmer. Kentucky native. Married Mary E. Tune Waugh in 1856.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 401. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Marriages, Nicholas County, 1856. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Carlisle, District 1, p. 62. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Kentucky, Seventh Congressional District, Nicholas County, 1863, p. 17. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Carlisle, Precinct 4, p. 8.
